desktop.title: Pricing
desktop.intro: Obit offers three simple pricing tiers for Free, Team, and Enterprise customers. For custom solutions of 100,000 Obit builds or more, please contact customer@obit.com.

sections.content: 10 Obit Public URLs per month for $0.
1000 Obit Private URLs per month for $29 per user.
10,000 Obit Private URLs per month for $49 per user.
